net.tridentsdk.server.netty

Class ClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.server.netty.ClientConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerConnection

    public class ClientConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the connection of a client upon joining

        Checks if an IP address is logged into the server

        address - the address to check if online
        Returns:
        true if the IP is on the server, false if not

      • getConnection

        public static ClientConnection getConnection(java.net.InetSocketAddress address)
        Gets the connection by the IP address
        Parameters:
        address - the IP to lookup the connection handler
        Returns:
        the instance of the client handler associated with the IP, or null if not registered

        Parameters:

        Returns:
